names.pinyin: xie huang ai tang yi hao

actions: Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, drains Heat, cools the Blood, reduces Fire toxicity and inhibits the growth of cancer cells.
Drains Damp-Heat especially from the Lower Jiao, drains Fire, relieves Fire toxicity and inhibits the growth of cancer cells.
Cools and invigorates the Blood, stops bleeding, promotes healing, generates flesh topically and clears Damp-Heat.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, regulates menstruation, promotes urination, disperses swellings and inhibits the growth of cancer cells.
Disperses Wind-Heat, relieves Stagnation of Liver Qi and expels turbid filth.
Drains Damp-Heat especially from the Lower Jiao
Inhibits the growth of cancer cells
notes: Grind the ingredients into a powder, decoct into a paste, mix with wine and apply to the lower abdomen prior to going to bed each night. Remove in the morning.
